duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting and consulting with customers on products and services by utilizing knowledge, skills, and technology to achieve a world-class sales and service experience.
Demonstrating product and sales know-how with customers and providing product demonstrations to educate customers on full product capabilities.
Listening and evaluating customer needs, providing appropriate solutions, and achieving sales and customer experience goals and objectives.
Facilitating comprehensive customer onboarding activities and ensuring customers fully understand how to use and manage all company products/services.
Performing operational and administrative tasks and resolving customer issues in partnership with customer care.
Demonstrating sales excellence and professionalism with integrity and a warm and friendly demeanor to customers and teammates.
Complying with all company and retail operational policies and procedures, completing training requirements, and engaging in team huddles and learning.
Understanding sales compensation plan and its key elements, and working a flexible schedule that includes evenings, weekends, holidays, and overtime as needed.
Being able to carry and lift up to 25-pound boxes, stand and move about the store constantly, and perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
